Reviews.Title: it performs as described but not at the best performance
Reviews.Author: 41reviews

Overall I found that it is really just for a basic user wanting to surf the Web or for your kids or something. I wouldn't take this tablet on a road trip because you would be needing to charge it every hour if you use it continously.I do find that it can do what it's suppose to do. The quality of the camera was low - I wouldn't send these pictures to print be any means. But it definitely can preform the basic functions and even the ones I threw at it. I just really didn't like the battery life of it. I felt like I had to charge it every other hour. I received this item for a honest review.

Reviews.Title: Works well and at a budget price
Reviews.Author: Angela Streiff
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_moS1YX11ROSSX7', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_moS1YX11ROSSX7loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html/ref=cm_ciu_vr_moS1YX11ROSSX7/191-2762765-4066001?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_moS1YX11ROSSX7currentClick) { return cv_moS1YX11ROSSX7currentClick(); } } } Length:: 4:05 MinsMy Simbans tablet is working quite well, and I've not yet had any of the less than positive experiences some of the other reviews have mentioned. I've had really bad tablets before, and this is not one of them. Please note that in my attached video, the lines on the screen are the effect of my camera trying to film a screen. They are not lines on the tablet's screen. The screen on the tablet is clear and colorful.Pros:- Touch screen works REALLY well. Very responsive.- Screen is bright and clear.- Sounds is adequate. Very clear, not muddy. But don't expect a lot of base.- Buttons are all easy to access and push. Volume rocker built in, so no need to rely only on the on-screen functions.- Charges really fast (however this is because of a smaller battery, so it also discharges fast)- Built in camera- Wifi works well- Apps work fine. I haven't run into any crashes yet. Small/simple game apps run okay. But don't try and play anything apps that require a super powerful processor. You'll get some lag. Angry Birds type app games are fine. But racing simulator games and such are probably too much for it.- It works! I'm amazed they can make a tablet that works this well for this price.Cons:- Screen is not glass and if you press too hard, you can damage it. Fortunately the tablet has such high touch screen sensitivity, I haven't need to press hard on it.- As mentioned before, it has small battery. So while it does charge up quickly, is also discharges quickly.Other notes:Keep in mind this is not a $300+ tablet, and doesn't have the same kinds of hardware inside. So browsing the internet and launching application is a bit slower. You have to wait a few seconds for each action.I did not run into the problem of the charger breaking. I've plugged mine in and out of the wall and tablet several times and it's still in one piece. It looks and feels just like any other power adapter and seems to work in the same way.The red color of this tablet has orange undertones to it. So if you have your heart set on an exact cherry red color, this isn't that. Personally I like the reddish-orange color even better.Conclusion:This tablet is good for someone who needs something very basic. You're not going to replace your computer with this. It's a good little device for reading emails, playing Angry Birds or doing crossword puzzles, using as an eReader or doing some browsing online. I wouldn't suggest it for some one looking for a tablet just to watch Netflix, because of the short battery life. You won't make it though a whole movie.Because of it's price point, it does make a good tablet for kids (who can play without damaging the screen), adults who need something for basic uses and even grandma and grandpa who just want something to read emails on and play some Sudoku. It's a good little device, just keep in mind the short battery life.Sample provided for review

Reviews.Title: Buy it For the Right Reasons
Reviews.Author: K. Groh
Reviews.Content: I have a Kindle as well as a Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 tablet. There is not a lot of comparison but there is also not the same price tag. But I mention it because this tablet lacks in some areas but definitely comes through in others.This is a $60 tablet so you should not expect it to function the same as a $300 one.After using this for a few weeks, here are my thoughts:* The tablet burns through battery usage when connected to the internet. If you want to have it last while you are using apps, turn off wi-fi* Wi-fi works fine for me. I had no trouble connecting and reconnecting.* While you can use it plugged in and charging, it does do some funny things at times especially with the onscreen keypad.* I was able to download apps from Google and Amazon Appstore. But it does have memory limits so you will not be playing it for big games or using it with complex apps.* The screen is adequate. The colors are off - a little big of a blue tint but again, clear enough for basic use and after awhile, you don't notice it.* Battery life is adequate. It does wear down quicker than my other tablets but it certainly lasts enough for a couple of hours before recharging.* It comes with a few widgets and basic apps and if you are used to an android system, it will look familiar. You can easily download some additional free apps.* It does have a camera which takes adequate pictures. Again, nothing like a high end camera or more expensive tablet.* The power button is in an awkward position so it is easy to tap it off while using the tablet. After awhile, you get used to its position and try to adapt how you hold it.* It is a basic 7" tablet so it will fit into most tablet cases that have elastic grips.* My 9 year-old daughter has been using it a lot and is having a great time. Recommended for a responsible child as a first tablet.The bottom line: if you can only afford an inexpensive tablet, if you have a child that is always taking yours, if you just need a real basic model and don't want to invest a lot, then this is a good solution. If you are expecting the same quality and functionality of an iPad or Samsung, save up your money for when you can afford that price tag.I was provided a unit for evaluation and review.

Reviews.Title: all 4 stopped working, wont load past android logo.
Reviews.Author: sylvia
Reviews.Content: I bought 4 and all 4 stopped working, wont load past android logo. 3 stays on android logo and 1 shuts off after logo. has any1 else had this problem.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet
Reviews.Author: li-kaenemman
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the cost but the only problem is the battery after fully charged will only last for half an hour.

Reviews.Title: gift for mom
Reviews.Author: K. Gonsior "Clearence Queen"
Reviews.Content: Lots of features for reasonable price, didnt want to spend a lot if mom couldnt use, she seems to be taking to it.

Reviews.Title: A Terrible Inconvenience!
Reviews.Author: Shaunese Rowland
Reviews.Content: I was so disappointed with this product I could have screamed! Poor quality Tablet,  ridiculously slow, it would sometimes display my icons and status bar upside down,  it wouldn't reboot though I tried about 12 times, it didn't hold a charge and there were no damn instructions or contact information. I spent hours trying to update things and download out of Google Play. Today I'm ready to break it in half!! I just want all my money back!!!

Reviews.Title: not as described
Reviews.Author: jojack
Reviews.Content: This tablet SUCKS. Charger broke within and week and then charging port broke contactected seller with nothing done to fix or replace the tablet seller does not contact back refuses to do anything DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! description says 4Gigs of hard drive but when i got it it had less than 1. Also it has. horrible battery life. doesn't even stay charged an hour. also when plugged up i can't use it because i will press in one part of the screen and it will register a touch somewhere completely different. not impressed with either of the 2 tablets i have bought on amazon

Reviews.Title: GREAT LITTLE TABLET
Reviews.Author: MomOf3
Reviews.Content: Very comparable price for what you get.* Have not had over heating issues - as noted in others' reviews* Have not had volume issues - as noted in others' reviewsPros:* Charge lasts quite a long time* Takes the same charger as Samsung cell phones (which we also have) so, only have to have one charging unit plugged in for everything.* Clear screen* Good amount of space* Very easy set up* LightweightCons:* Very sensitive to touch with both fingers and stylus* When you have a lot going on - has a slight chance of buffering during Netflix* Quite a few games my boyfriend plays have not been supported on tablets yet... - he thinks this is a boo hoo item.Bought also:Basic 7" tablet stand with usb keyboardUniversal 7" touch screen protector table screen protectors (came as a packet of 5)2-yr SquareTrade Tablet protection - based off of the reviews I had read on this productNo issues so far - have been using it since August 2013 and will update if anything goes awry.

Reviews.Title: THIS IS AN AMAZINGY $69.93(Total cost) DEAL ! !
Reviews.Author: USA gentleman
Reviews.Content: I am blown away by this SIMBANS Tablet PC with dual cam. It is amazingly fast, and, so easy to use that, I am buying another. In my humble opinion, you get more than you pay for on this deal! It isn't an IPAD, but it is amazing how well it works and performs for under $70. WOW ! Here are the minor issues...The speaker is not loud enough to hear, but it sure drives a boom cube with amazing "room sound". The first few times I Skyped on it, the internal mic produced a clicking noise, but that seems to have resolved itself. There is no external mic plug, and I have not yet tried to get the app for bluetooth. So, I don't know if an external mic is possible that way, or maybe through the mini usb? Cam quality is acceptable on front and rear cams.I use this device to Skype, Email, Research, Listen to Music, Watch Movies and more. It performs with reliable consistency !! THANKS SIMBANS !THANKS AMAZON !

Reviews.Title: Bad
Reviews.Author: Dawn Finsrud
Reviews.Content: This product sucks. I highly suggest you read reviews before buying. Unfortunately I did not. Good thing it is returnable.

Reviews.Title: instructions too small and won't connect to my wifi-but 2 other computers working
Reviews.Author: Rush Fan "ThisChickLuvzRush"
Reviews.Content: SOOO disappointed with this. it refuses to connect to the IP but my computer from which I am writing this is perfectly connected. The instructions are so damned small, you can't see a thing. Need a microfiche machine to read it. so pissed-should have spent a bit more to get something that works.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Jud
Reviews.Content: It was not what I was expected, there are other brands that is a better quality in overall. The battery life only 2 hours the most. Quality of the screen is very poor. My daughter love my Kindle that's the reason I decided to purchased something she can play her games. She does not like it at all. I wasted my money!

Reviews.Title: Battery life is terrible
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be an okay tablet to buy seeing as how I wouldn't be using it heavily. I was wrong. I wasn't disappointed until I realized that my battery charge only lasted thirty minutes. And for some reason some of the setup information that I want changed is never saved when I turn it back on. If I could go back and do it over again I would have spent a little more money on something nicer.

Reviews.Title: Horrible quality control
Reviews.Author: Spawn082
Reviews.Content: Was DOA never charged failed out of the box. Stinks because it was a test for several other gifts instead had to purchase from CDW to make my deadline.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money on this product! You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Happy Husband
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money on this product! It's a waste. Poor quality. The charger doesn't connect well...no contact. Full battery lasted only 30 mins and after we had it for 1 month, it wouldn't even charge.

Reviews.Title: BOGUS
Reviews.Author: Shakisha Mccarter
Reviews.Content: The tablet don't even look, how it looks on amazon, the battery dies too quick and certain things want download. No I wouldn't recommend this to anybody. I choose I hate it cause it do.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: jww
Reviews.Content: seemed to work ok, but prong pulled out of charger first time it was charged up put it  back in and it worked a couple times then quit charging I have a new charger ordered at my expense, battery did not stay up long, very short cord on charger

Reviews.Title: Another chinese brand-less tablet
Reviews.Author: tastygrapes
Reviews.Content: These devices are made in mass quantity at rock bottom cost in China and then resold under a variety of meaningless names, there is no such thing as a legit or counterfeit Simbans tablet as they all come from the same place in China regardless what reselling brand is slapped on them. In this case, no branding is present at all lol. Check out this hardware dump from the one I purchased here. [...]Just about all information provided in the item listing is current inaccurate, I've submitted most of the changes to Amazon so hopefully they update that. Some key differences to note.*Internal storage is not 4GB, its confusing but its much lower.*Android version is a very buggy re-imagination of 4.1.1*Can take a SDHC card upto 32GB, SDCX upto 64GB*CPU is not the A13, while the clock speed is similar its not nearly as powerful, this device has a ARMv7 based CPU comparable to the iPhone 3GS if that helps you understand*The keyboard is very unresponsive and buggy, typing a simple letter is a real chore, you can trigger keys that are no where near the key you are actually pressing. Voice typing didn't seem to work at all for me.*Battery life is pretty terrible, I didn't break it open to check the mAh but it would be totally depleted in about an hour of actual use, say watching a movie or browsing the web. Standby is about double that, It went from 90% to 12% in about 90 minutes of sitting beside me with wifi enabled. Mind you this device doesn't support cellular or GPS or Bluetooth so the run-time is really pitiful.*Wireless is a bit annoying, it for some reason can not see a hidden network, if you don't broadcast the SSID you will not be able to connect. For me this is no good, I prefer the hidden networks with MAC address filtering.*Video was very choppy playing back 480p but its suppose to handle 1080p just fine, I guess playback is relative, it was playing but very very poorly.Overall, the price is not terrible for what you are getting, which is really not much at all. I'm sending it back because the entire list of features is inaccurate and for my needs it just won't cut it. Maybe get a Google Nexus 7 or something, it might cost you $199 but you will get the processing power of 10 of these tablets that choke during just about everything.

Reviews.Title: Four stars because of the super-low price
Reviews.Author: R. Rusu
Reviews.Content: Just received one.  I give it four stars because of the super-low price.  May update the review after more use.Pros - higher than normal resolution (1024x600) compared to any other cheap tablets - * GPS, Bluetooth, and SIM slot (haven't tested yet, bit if they all work that's great) - bright and responsive touch screen - microSD card slot - pretty responsive web browsing (so far) - has manual buttons for volume on the side, and 4 hardware buttons in front - USB connector for keyboard/mouse (if desired)Cons - heavy--a bit heavier than a kindle Fire, haven't weighed it exactly - old version of Android, so a lot of newer apps won't run - don't see any micro-HDMI or equivalent for video output - though the charger looks like a standard USB charger, it doesn't seem to charge for other chargers (or from a laptop computer) - seems to not be able to connect to WPA2-Personal AES wifi, but connects to others, so I will just live with this

Reviews.Title: Broke within a month
Reviews.Author: Andrea S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son's birthday last May. He loved it but it broke within a month. It would not power on. I emailed Amazon to get a replacement since it is supposed to come with a warranty. They gave me a refund and I had to just return it because Amazon said they did not sell the product so they could not give me a replacement. Ended up just buying my son a Nook. Don't waste your money on this.

Reviews.Title: terrible knock off never buying a knockoff again
Reviews.Author: Lacrystal
Reviews.Content: U can tell its a knock off. First day it worked fine then second day it froze up. Front camera didnt work at all. You cannot i repeat cannot video chat. Waste of money. Still waiting for my refund.

Reviews.Title: Non-functional
Reviews.Author: Ms. No "avid booker"
Reviews.Content: This tablet came and stated that the SD card was damaged then it just burnt out on me was only able to charge it and setup the email address.  Had to send it back, was unable to turn it back on in order to clear off the email account I had set up. I then contacted Amazon for a refund to purchase another tablet.  Only had it for 6 hours before it was over.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: c
Reviews.Content: side charger ports broke within 2 weeks  of purchasing, can no longer use the tablet don't know what to do.

Reviews.Title: Title says Jelly Bean 4.1 OS but product description says 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich.
Reviews.Author: kandiamo
Reviews.Content: Title and product description says Jelly Bean 4.1 OS but product technical detail says 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich, which is the previous operating system.Buyers might want to get the true OS in writing from the seller.  The OS may be ICS4.0 with a JB4.1 interface upgrade.  The difference is performance.

Reviews.Title: not worth the hassle
Reviews.Author: klikmaus
Reviews.Content: When you get a cheapo tablet, you expect low quality. Low res screen, laggy touch response, poor compatibility. This tablet, however, is beyonld bad. While it came with google play preinstalled, it WOULD NOT sync with my existing account nor would it set up a new google account. Additionally it would not even stay connected to my wifi access point for more than five minutes at a time without disconnecting its self from my connection. If I could give it negative stars, I would. RETURNED.

Reviews.Title: Worst item I ever bought in my entire life!
Reviews.Author: Deslyn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my niece because of the price. I was hoping it would be a nice little fun gadget that she can play with. The battery life is horrible, 30mins for the most. The screen freezes, and the device now operates very slow. I would return it if the return period didn't expired. Horrible! Hey I guess the price says it all huh!

Reviews.Title: Simbans 7" Android Tablet
Reviews.Author: Nancy Raymick
Reviews.Content: I am not very please with this. It will not take very many apps.hard to find apps. that it will take. otherwise it is okay

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my 12 year old nephew, we haven't even had the product for 24 hours and the tablet completely melted, I will be returning the product and do not recommend it at all!

Reviews.Title: I mrs Josephine Collins
Reviews.Author: josephine collins
Reviews.Content: I am very displease with this device,I have no way to plug it up there's no instruction in the packaging and two of the same cards and I just receive it and will be returning it as soon as possible it want power on and I can't get it to charge wIthout a charger
